function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential misinformation about the role of 5G in COVID-19 prevention and control.","Impact":"Could lead to false beliefs and behaviors that do not effectively prevent the spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Public education and clarification on the actual role of 5G in pandemic prevention.","Technologies":"Public information campaigns, fact-checking tools.","People":"General public, especially those susceptible to misinformation.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Reliance on 5G technology may lead to neglect of other important preventive measures.","Impact":"Reduced emphasis on proven public health measures such as vaccination, mask-wearing, and hand hygiene.","Mitigation":"Emphasize the complementary role of 5G alongside traditional prevention measures.","Technologies":"Integration of 5G communication with existing public health infrastructure.","People":"Policy makers, healthcare professionals, and technology developers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, technology companies."},{"Description":"Limited accessibility to 5G technology may exacerbate existing health disparities.","Impact":"Unequal access to 5G technology could widen the gap in pandemic prevention and control between different socio-economic groups.","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure to ensure equitable access to 5G technology.","Technologies":"Expansion of 5G networks in underserved areas, subsidy programs for technology access.","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income individuals.","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government agencies."}]}
